mapper.select: select * from product where p_name like '%'||#{p_name}||'%'
select * from productio where io_name like '%'||#{io_name}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into product (p_code, p_name, p_image, p_image_d, p_image_m, p_cate, p_cate_d, p_price, p_amount, p_content, p_regdate, p_mdate) values (#{p_code}, #{p_name}, #{p_image}, #{p_image_d}, #{p_image_m}, #{p_cate}, #{p_cate_d}, #{p_price}, #{p_amount}, #{p_content}, sysdate, sysdate)
insert into productio (io_code, io_name, io_amount, io_before_amount, io_content, io_regdate) values (#{io_code}, #{io_name}, #{io_amount}, #{io_before_amount}, #{io_content}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update product set p_amount = #{p_amount} where p_code = #{p_code}
update product set p_image = null where p_code = #{p_code}
update product set p_image_d = null where p_code = #{p_code}
update product set p_image_m = null where p_code = #{p_code}
